segments.text: If I won the Pools , I'd go round the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I don't know . I'd buy a big house with a garden for my wife and kids , I suppose . But it's difficult to imagine having a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One thing's certain . If I had a lot of money , I wouldn't work any more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wouldn't you ? What would you do with all that spare time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As I said , I'd go round the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you do after that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I don't know . It'd take me a long time to go round the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , we haven't won the Pools , and we're not likely to win them . So there isn't much point in talking about it , is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be happy if I got a rise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And my wife would be happy if I bought her a mink coat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm not likely to get a rise and you haven't the money for a mink coat , so let's come down to earth and have another drink .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll have a pint of the best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd have a Scotch if I were you . We deserve it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Make it a double , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2
